pageSize.description: Optional. Maximum number of paths to return. The server may return fewer items than requested. If unspecified, the server will pick an appropriate default.

pageToken.description: Optional. Page token received from a previous `QueryDirectoryContents` call. Provide this to retrieve the subsequent page. When paginating, all other parameters provided to `QueryDirectoryContents` must match the call that provided the page token.

path.description: Optional. The directory's full path including directory name, relative to the workspace root. If left unset, the workspace root is used.
